title: Kites
description: A wounded man searches for his sweetheart in the Mexican desert while on the run from the police, bounty hunters, and others.

reviews.text: The ending was completely pathetic and disappointing and it ruins everything the movie was building up to.
Its a good movie, with good combination of things. Proper ratio of things makes this good movie, a full entertainment.
Movie is tooo good. Hrithik rockszzz.
Cool Movie.. Hrithik's Dance is amazing. Barbara acts the emotions brilliantly. Overall a satisfying experience.
